PISI.Name: applications.science
PISI.Summary: Applications that can be used with scientific purposes
Logiciels reliées aux différentes branches scientifiques
PISI.Description: This component contains software related to branches of science like astronomy, mathematics and chemistry.
Bu bileşende astronomi, matematik ve kimya gibi çeşitli bilim dallarıyla ilgili yazılımlar bulunur.
Cette composante contient des logiciels concernant les mathématiques, la chimie et l'astronomie.
